Rinkside.Description: Seats right next to the action for an unparalleled game experience.
Rinkside.View_Quality: Direct ice-level view, engaging and immersive experience.
Rinkside.Unique_Features: Chance for player interactions, possibility of being seen on TV.
Rinkside.Accessibility: Easy access, but limited space for personal mobility devices.
Rinkside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to premium lounges, complimentary dining and beverages.

Club_Seats.Description: Offering a fantastic view of the game from the sides with added benefits.
Club_Seats.View_Quality: Elevated side views with clear line of sight to the ice.
Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Wider seats with more leg room, less crowded sections.
Club_Seats.Accessibility: Dedicated entrance for easier access, nearby elevators.
Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Access to exclusive clubs and in-seat wait service.

Center_Balcony.Description: Great overall view of the game from an elevated position.
Center_Balcony.View_Quality: Panoramic view of the ice, ideal for tactical analysis.
Center_Balcony.Unique_Features: Affordable pricing for a comprehensive view of the action.
Center_Balcony.Accessibility: Accessible seating available, elevators to balcony level.
Center_Balcony.Special_Perks: More budget-friendly option with a full view of the game.

Loge_Level.Description: Just above rink level, offering close views without being on the ice.
Loge_Level.Sections: Mid Ice Sections 101-103 and 111-113; Corners Sections 104-106, 108-110, 114-116, and 118-120
Loge_Level.View_Quality: Close to the action with a slightly elevated perspective.
Loge_Level.Unique_Features: Proximity to the ice with a more accessible price point.
Loge_Level.Special_Perks: Good balance of price, view, and experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Clyde Fraziers Wine and Dine
restaurants_bars.description: Themed restaurant owned by Knicks legend Walt 'Clyde' Frazier, offering American cuisine and a free-throw basketball court.

restaurants_bars.name: Stout NYC
restaurants_bars.description: A spacious, bustling Irish pub known for its extensive selection of beers and proximity to Madison Square Garden.

restaurants_bars.name: The Pennsy Food Hall
restaurants_bars.description: A food hall located right above Penn Station, offering a variety of food options for Knicks fans before the game.

restaurants_bars.name: Smiths Bar & Grill
restaurants_bars.description: Classic sports bar atmosphere with a wide selection of beers and American fare, perfect for pre-game gatherings.

restaurants_bars.name: John Sullivans Bar & Grill
restaurants_bars.description: Cozy Irish pub offering hearty meals and a vibrant atmosphere, a short walk from Madison Square Garden.

restaurants_bars.name: Hudson Station Bar & Grill
restaurants_bars.description: A popular gathering spot for sports enthusiasts, featuring an extensive menu and game day specials.

accommodations.name: Hotel Pennsylvania
accommodations.description: Historic hotel offering straightforward accommodations with easy access to Madison Square Garden.

accommodations.name: The New Yorker, A Wyndham Hotel
accommodations.description: Iconic art deco hotel with comfortable rooms, located close to Madison Square Garden.

accommodations.name: Moxy NYC Times Square
accommodations.description: Trendy hotel with unique, stylish rooms and rooftop bar, minutes away from Madison Square Garden.

accommodations.name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station
accommodations.description: Comfortable and convenient hotel offering complimentary breakfast and stunning views, located next to Penn Station and Madison Square Garden.

tourist_attractions.name: Empire State Building
tourist_attractions.description: Iconic skyscraper offering observation decks with spectacular views of New York City.

tourist_attractions.name: Times Square
tourist_attractions.description: Famous for its bright lights, shopping, entertainment, and New Year's Eve ball drop, a must-visit location in NYC.

tourist_attractions.name: Central Park
tourist_attractions.description: A green oasis in the heart of New York City, offering walking paths, boat rentals, and the Central Park Zoo.

tourist_attractions.name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.description: One of the world's largest and finest art museums, featuring over two million works of art spanning 5,000 years.

tourist_attractions.name: The Statue of Liberty
tourist_attractions.description: A symbol of freedom and democracy, this iconic statue is located on Liberty Island and accessible by ferry.

team_related_activities.name: Madison Square Garden Tours
team_related_activities.description: Join the guided tours of Madison Square Garden and experience the home of the New York Rangers. Explore behind-the-scenes areas and learn about the storied history of the team.

team_related_activities.name: Hudson Yards
team_related_activities.description: Nearby Madison Square Garden, Hudson Yards is a modern neighborhood featuring shopping, dining, and the Vessel sculpture, adding to your game day experience.

team_related_activities.name: The Rink at Rockefeller Center
team_related_activities.description: During the holiday season, enjoy iconic outdoor ice skating at Rockefeller Center, a classic New York experience perfect for families and fans.

options.description: The New York City Subway system provides convenient access to Madison Square Garden, with Pennsylvania Station located directly underneath.
New York's extensive bus network serves the Madison Square Garden area, offering easy access from across the city.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official New York Rangers Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all Rangers ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best selection of seats.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner for events at Madison Square Garden, providing a secure platform for purchasing official tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A reliable secondary marketplace for Rangers tickets, offering a fanProtect guarantee.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
